thread.title: Life | A live chicken is running the Twitter account of a fast-food chain
thread.title_full: Life | A live chicken is running the Twitter account of a fast-food chain - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Life | A live chicken is running the Twitter account of a fast-food chain
text:
You might be forgiven for thinking some social media accounts are run by headless chickens, but in this case, it's actually true. Sort of.
Chicken Treat, a fast-food chain in Australia, has put an actual live chicken in charge of its Twitter account and is letting it send as many tweets as it wants until it makes up a five-letter, English word.
The fast-food chain are deadly serious about this, believing that Betty (that's the chicken's name) will be the first chicken to win a Guinness World Record for tweeting.
Betty will be staying at the "luxurious Chicken Tweet HQ" until she completes her task and, so far, she hasn't had much luck.
x 0 ' 44 xx #chickentweet
— Chicken Treat (@ChickenTreat) October 17, 2015
